dcterms:creator: M. Zaki
dcterms:description: A valuable resource for conducting research on Arabic teaching and learning as well as Arabic NLP. It includes 282,732 words and 1,585 materials (written and spoken) produced by 942 students from 67 nationalities and 66 different backgrounds.
dcterms:title: Arabic Learner Corpus (ALC)

dcterms:creator: A. Diment
E. Fagerlund
A. Benfield
T. Virtanen
dcterms:description: A corpus of 17 common words from a Moroccan Arabic Darija class, pronounced by 12 participants, containing 3,851 audios, with 2,961 correct pronunciations and 890 mispronunciations.
dcterms:title: Dataset for Moroccan Arabic language pronunciation error detection

dcterms:creator: S. Nakagawa
L. Wang
S. Ohtsuka
dcterms:description: A dataset containing Mel frequency cepstrum coefficients (MFCC) used for speaker identification and verification.
dcterms:title: MFCC features dataset
